name: Fiery Escape
description:
A game made following BlackThornprods Unity Tutorial :

https://www.udemy.com/course/make-your-first-2d-game-with-unity-c-beginner-cours...

Avoid getting hit by falling enemies. Current score is shown on the top right, top middle is your best highscore.

Use "a" and "d" to move left and right and press "Space" for a short dash.
